ValidationRule.description: Sales should be restricted from editing ROOFPRO information on Accounts (i.e. fields that cannot be made read-only on either FLS or Page Layout level.).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "CARS"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "USRS")), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "IKOPRO"), OR( ISCHANGED( Name ), ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), ISCHANGED( Applicant_Information__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to edit the following ROOFPRO Contractor Account fields: Account Name, Account Owner, Applicant Information.
